title: Treasure Found
description: Treasure Found is a book about different types of treasures found throughout time. It names famous treasure hunters and their finds, such as Howard Carter and the tomb of King Tut; and Mel Fisher, who found underwater treasures worth millions of dollars. Photographs and maps support the text.
meta: cargo, clues, historians, markings, metal detectors, museums, shipwreck, sonar
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Pronouns : Identify and understand the use of pronouns
Compound Words : Recognize and form compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
